Student module¶

Class Student

This class records the basic information and rating of a student, manages the group which a student belongs to, and the requests between the student and any group.

class Student.Student(userid, name, email, year, major, intro, first_program_language, second_program_language, third_program_language, server_side_framework, client_side_framework, frontend_score, backend_score)¶

Bases: object

userid¶

user id

Type

int

name¶

name of the user

Type

str

email¶

email address of the user

Type

str

year¶

the current year that the user is in

Type

str

major¶

the major of user

Type

str

intro¶

a short paragraph of self-introduction written by the user

Type

str

first_program_language¶

the first programming language that the user has (sorted by preference)

Type

str

second_program_language¶

the second programming language that the user has (sorted by preference)

Type

str

third_program_language¶

the third programming language that the user has (sorted by preference)

Type

str

server_side_framework¶

a list of server-side frameworks that the user has

Type

list(str)

client_side_framework¶

a list of client-side frameworks that the user has

Type

list(str)

frontend_score¶

a score measuring the frontend skills evaluated by the user

Type

int

backend_score¶

a score measuring the frontend skills evaluated by the user

Type

int

open¶

True if this student is not yet in a group (so it will show in the student list). By default, it is set True when a new student is created.

Type

bool

group¶

indicating which group this user belongs to, and None if this user has not been in any group. By default, it is set None when a new student is created.

Type

Group

individual_requests¶

a list recording all the individual requests the user received By default, it is empty when a new student is created.

Type

list(Request)

edit_frameworks(server_side, client_side)¶

Edit the server/client-side frameworks.

Parameters

  • server_side (list(str)) –

  • client_side (list(str)) –

Returns

(bool) True if the update of information succeeds, False otherwise.

edit_programming_language(first, second, third)¶

Edit the programming languages by preference.

Parameters

  • first (str) – first preferred programming language

  • second (str) – second preferred programming language

  • third (str) – third preferred programming language

Returns

(bool) True if the update of information succeeds, False otherwise.

edit_user_info(name, email, year, major, intro)¶

Edit the basic information including name, email address, current year, major and introduction.

Parameters

  • name (str) –

  • email (str) –

  • year (str) –

  • major (str) –

  • intro (str) –

Returns

(bool) True if the update of information succeeds, False otherwise.

edit_user_rating(frontend_skill_score, backend_skill_score)¶

Edit the skill scores by self-evaluation.

Parameters

  • frontend_skill_score (int) –

  • backend_skill_score (int) –

Returns

(bool) True if the update of information succeeds, False otherwise.

get_all_individual_requests()¶

This method returns all the individual requests the user received.

Returns

(list(json)) a list of individual requests instances

static get_all_students_info()¶

It returns all the student instances created before as a list of json where each entry in the list has the pre-defined structure.

Returns

list(json) a list of student instances

Note

This method is static for class Student.

get_user_info()¶

Return the public and basic information of the user in a pre-defined manner.

Returns

(json) pre-defined structure of attributes in a student

send_group_request(target_group_id)¶

This method sends a group request to the group with target group_id.

Parameters

target_group_id (int) – the target group’s id

send_individual_request(target_student_id)¶

This method sends an individual request to the student with target student_id.

Parameters

target_student_id (int) – the target student’s uid
